import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../css/CreatePost.css' export default function CreatePost() { // InitialState const InitialState = { title:'', description:'', picture:'', username:'', categories:'', createdDate:new Date() } const [postData , setPostData] = useState(InitialState) const handleOnChange = (e)=>{ console.log({...postData , [e.target.name]:e.target.value}) setPostData({...postData , [e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } const imageUrl = 'https://images.unsplash.com/uploads/141103282695035fa1380/95cdfeef?auto=format&fit=crop&q=80&w=2030&ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D' return ( <>
{/* ---------------------------------------------Upload Button------------------------------------------------- */}
) }
